original_text: But when the crowd had been put outside, he went in and took her by the hand, and the girl arose.
korean_text: 무리를 내보낸 후에 예수께서 들어가사 소녀의 손을 잡으시매 일어나는지라

sentences.original_text: But when the crowd had been put outside
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 무리가 밖으로 나가게 되었을 때,

sentences.original_text: and took her by the hand
